message: The room is the size of a banquet hall.
The moment I see the person standing at its center, I feel my entire body go rigid.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Toue."
Toue is there, hands folded calmly behind his back, watching us with a little smile.
It's almost like he was waiting for us.

He looks just like he did on TV.<K>
...No. It's different seeing him in the flesh.
On the outside, he looks like a perfect gentleman, but there's an aura around him, as if he were concealing a set of well-sharpened knives behind that smile.
Two masked figures are standing behind him. Those have to be his bodyguards.

name: 東江
message: "I always knew you would come to me some day, but I never thought you'd be together. I've been waiting for you, Mink. And you, Aoba."
He knows who I am? And Mink, too?
We've never met before...

name: 蒼葉
message: "How do you know my name?"

name: 東江
message: "Oval Tower keeps track of every person who enters Platinum Jail. You included."
Toue smiles knowingly.
When I turn to Mink, I see his face hard with anger―just like when he saw Toue on the screen.

name: ミンク
message: "...You piece of shit. You knew exactly what we were up to."

name: ミンク
message: "You could've stopped us if you wanted to, but you didn't do a damn thing. Even after we fucked it up."

name: 東江
message: "Naturally. I've been keeping a close eye on you ever since I heard you'd escaped prison."

name: ミンク
message: "Then you know why I'm here."

name: 東江
message: "But of course. Why else would the last remaining survivor of the proud People of the Gods be here?"

name: 東江
message: "Now that I finally have the chance, there's something I've wanted to say. I wronged you then, truly. I would like to apologize to you―and your people."
...Instantly, the air around Mink changes.
It's like watching a strong wind fan an ember into a blaze. Now, bloodlust rolls off him in waves.
I've never seen such clear emotion on Mink's face before. Is this... this hate... the source of Mink's resolve?

name: 東江
message: "Even if it was in the name of science, it was most unfortunate that we had to sacrifice your people for the experiment."

name: 東江
message: "But you possessed such extraordinary talents, like the herbal medicines passed down through the generations of your tribe."

name: 東江
message: "These medicines, when ingested or smoked like tobacco, allowed your people to manipulate their body odor."

name: 東江
message: "This was intended for healing, of course. But it could also be used to manipulate the mind."

name: 東江
message: "Scent-based mind control. Absolutely fascinating."

name: 東江
message: "According to rumor, your blood contained such high concentrations of the compound that anyone who drank it would enter a euphoric state."

name: 東江
message: "And yet, not a single one of you was willing to give up the recipe. You believed it sacred, a gift from your gods."

name: 東江
message: "Your people were so firmly united in their faith, we had no choice but to analyze your blood directly."

name: 東江
message: "It was essential that we learn how it was made."
He analyzed their blood...
Earlier, Toue said that he had to sacrifice Mink's people.
Is he saying he... killed them to get their blood?
No way....
But if that's what happened... then Mink's rage is no mystery at all.
Mink is glaring at Toue, his eyes hard and sharp as ice.

name: 東江
message: "But ultimately, the effort was for naught. We learned nothing of substance. Even our cutting-edge technology couldn't uncover the secrets of your people."

name: 東江
message: "Nature is truly mysterious. Sometimes it can create miracles that even science cannot explain."

name: 東江
message: "And now, you are the last survivor. I imagine you know how to create that medicine, don't you?"

name: ミンク
message: "And why the fuck would I tell you?"

name: 東江
message: "Naturally, I don't expect it to be that easy. Which is why I would like to make a deal with you."

name: 東江
message: "In exchange for the recipe, I will grant whatever you desire. Assuming it is within my power. What do you say?"
Toue takes a step toward Mink, a glint of challenge in his eyes.
Mink doesn't move a muscle.
He's angry―I have no doubt about that―but there's a darker, fiercer aura surrounding him now.
After a long pause, Mink lets out a little sigh and laughs.

name: ミンク
message: "...You want it that badly, huh? I have to say, I'm impressed."

name: 東江
message: "That's just how much I respect your people. Take it as a token of my admiration, if you will. Surely you can appreciate how I feel."

name: 東江
message: "Controlling people's minds through technology is simple, but a naturally occurring gift? There's no power in the world greater or more sublime."

name: ミンク
message: "What if say I want everything you own?"

name: 東江
message: "Well, that would make conducting research and business rather difficult. However, I could arrange for you to acquire wealth and status equivalent to my own."

name: ミンク
message: "...Ha. I bet."

name: 東江
message: "...Is that your condition, then? We have a deal?
Toue seems to have taken Mink's smile at face value. But I know better.
The next moment, it's gone.

name: ミンク
message: "No deal. What I want is your fucking life."

name: 東江
message: "...I see."
Toue nods a few times, the smile still on his lips. His eyes never leave Mink's face.

name: 東江
message: "I had a feeling you might say that."
